titleStmt.title: By the King a proclamation for the auoiding of all intercourse betweene His Maiesties royall court, and the cities of London and Westminster, and places adioyning.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By I.L. and W.T. for Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, Printers to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: "Giuen at Our Court at Salisburyl the seuenth day of October, in the first yeere of Our Reigne of Great Brittaine, France and Ireland."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
